items.sentence: Have you framed those paintings I brought in last week?
He came to see me three days before he left for Africa.
I\'ve got a feeling that Tom won\'t graduate this year.
I\'ve waited two whole hours. I can\'t wait any longer.
Tom said he didn\'t think Mary had a driver\'s license.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice were seated around the table.
I guess you\'re going to do that no matter what we say.
What you\'re suggesting we do is absolutely impossible.
What\'s the difference between religion and philosophy?
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t have a passport?
Do you really think that Tom will be able to help Mary?
Do you think Tom still has many friends left in Boston?

You were lucky that you didn\'t get caught in the rain.
Are there any direct flights between Boston and Sydney?
